all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
We believe that a man must be called of God, by prophecy, and by the laying on of hands by those who are in authority, to preach the Gospel and administer in the ordinances thereof.
Articles of Faith 1:5
Quote of the Day
"I know all this to be true and bear witness … in the name of the most loyal and humble of all God’s sons."
President Jeffrey R. Holland | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
